summary: Makes hunting on Skyrim more enjoyable!
descriptionHtml: Edited some typical hunting gear in order to make hunting a little more realistic and fun.  Gear located on top floor of riverwood trader.  Place file in DATA folder, and run.  Have fun, I might add a save game as an optional file for total immersion but for now you have this.  Enjoy and if there are any questions, complaints, rude remarks, etc. the feel free to leave a comment!
author: sportzz4life
